name: Initrax d20 Initiative Tracker
description:
Initrax is the easy way for a dungeon master to track combat turn order when playing a tabletop role-playing game such as Dungeons and Dragons, Pathfinder, or any other d20-based system.

A lot of dungeon masters, myself included, want to stick closer to the "pen and paper" roots of Dungeons and Dragons, so we're not always going to use full-featured tools like D&D Beyond, Roll20, Hero Lab, or other similar tools that manage every aspect of a campaign for you. There are some things, however, that can still benefit from a little bit of helpful automation.

That's where Initrax comes in. This tool lets you track very basic information about your characters--both players and non-player characters--and set the turn order for combat when it is time to roll initiative. That's really it; the goal is to stay out of the way and let you run your game.
